name: Laozi
description:
LAOZI About the Game

Laozi is a  puzzle-action platformer where you must reach the top of the Himalaya and overcome all the obstacles in your path to obtain the power of the gods and purge the corruption that is invading the world.

Disclaimer

This is just a Beta version, the game is not finished yet and could have a few bugs, we are working really hard to release the game! Please download it and comment us what do you think about it!

Social Media

Follow us on twitter to see what we are doing: https://twitter.com/MikemewStudio
